com.advenio.medere.dao.nativeSQL.SQLQuer.query: SELECT s.sector, s.name, s.description, COALESCE(sectormanager.name, '') AS sectormanagername, a.description AS area, count(employee._user) AS qtyspetialist, CASE WHEN CAST(count(employee._user) AS float) = 0 THEN 0 -- Para evitar la divisi√≥n por cero ELSE CAST((todotasks.value / count(employee._user)) AS float)*100 -- Factor de carga END AS loadfactor FROM sector AS s JOIN area AS a ON a.area = s.area LEFT JOIN _user AS sectormanager ON s.sector = sectormanager.sectormanager LEFT JOIN _user AS employee ON s.sector = employee.sector AND employee.profile = 2 --Especialistas LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(t.task) AS value,c.sector FROM task AS t JOIN category AS c ON c.category = t.category WHERE t.state = 2 -- Estado por realizar GROUP BY c.sector ) AS todotasks ON todotasks.sector = s.sector GROUP BY s.sector,todotasks.value, s.name, s.description, COALESCE(sectormanager.name, ''), a.description
